item.title: CVE-2024-39655|2024-08-02T18:19:08.592Z -- liquidpoll -- liquidpoll%20%E2%80%93%20advanced%20polls%20for%20creators%20and%20brands
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LiquidPoll LiquidPoll – Advanced Polls for Creators and Brands.This issue affects LiquidPoll – Advanced Polls for Creators and Brands: from n/a through 3.3.77.
